info.title: Shipping Provider API
info.description:
## Shipping Provider API

The Shipping Provider API allows developers to create custom shipping providers to either create an app in the [Marketplace](https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/) or create custom shipping for a merchant as a [private app](/api-docs/getting-started/building-apps-bigcommerce/types-of-apps#types-of-apps_unlisted-marketplace-apps).

To learn more, see [Shipping Provider API Overview](/api-docs/store-management/shipping/shipping-provider-api).

base_options.description: The minimum required payload that is sent to retrieve rates

origin.title: Shipping Address
origin.description: Object representing a destination or origin address for items.

destination.title: Shipping Address
destination.description: Object representing a destination or origin address for items.

items.description: A cart item along with it's shipping specific attributes

length.description: Value object for a length measurement
length.title: Dimension Value

width.description: Value object for a length measurement
width.title: Dimension Value

height.description: Value object for a length measurement
height.title: Dimension Value

weight.description: Value object for a weight measurement
weight.title: Weight Value

discounted_price.description: Value object for a money amount
discounted_price.title: Money Value

declared_value.description: Value object for a money amount
declared_value.title: Money Value

attributes.description: A list of arbitrary properties stored as part of the product or product variant meta fields. These consist of public fields specific to the carrier integration.

key.description: The key associated with the meta field

value.description: The value associated with the meta field

namespace.description: The namespace associated with product(https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-reference/catalog/catalog-api/product-metafields/createproductmetafield) or product variant (https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-reference/catalog/catalog-api/product-variants-metafields/createvariantmetafield) meta fields. The meta field namespace should be saved under this format 'shipping_carrier_{yourCarrierId}' otherwise it will not be recognized as an attribute.

resource_type.description: Resource type associated with the meta field. Currently the only values available are 'product' or 'variant'

resource_id.description: The resource id of the meta field

attribute_type.description: Attribute type associated with the product or product variant meta field. Currently the only value for this is 'metafield'

items.title: Rate Request Item
Customer Group
items.description: The Group (if any) that this customer is in. This will be default to zero if the customer is not in a group or is a guest.

customer.title: Customer Details
customer.description: The details of the Customer that has made the purchase.

items.title: Reference Value
items.description: Value objects contained within the request context

request_context.title: Request Context
request_context.description: A collection of Reference Value objects.

base_options.title: Base Rate Request

zone_options.description: Optional, any zone specific request options declared by the carrier and configued by the merchant to retrieve rates
zone_options.title: Zone Options Instance

connection_options.description: Optional, any global request options declared by the carrier and configued by the merchant to retrieve rates
connection_options.title: Connection Options Instance

rate_options.description: Optional, any checkout specific request options to retrieve rates
rate_options.title: Rate Options Instance

schema.title: Rate Request Payload
schema.description: Payload sent off to a Shipping Provider in order to get quotes.

items.title: Message
items.description: A simple string/type response for returning information.
A grouping of carrier rates and optionally info about that carrier

display_name.description: A display name for the service

cost.description: Value object for a money amount
cost.title: Money Value

items.title: Message
items.description: A simple string/type response for returning information.

transit_time.title: Transit Time Object
transit_time.description: Value object for the length of time in transit

items.title: Rate Quote Object
items.description: A quote being returned as part of the rate request.

items.title: Carrier Quote Object

schema.title: Rate Response Payload
schema.description: The response from the Shipping Service, will contain zero to many quotes.

connection_options.description: Optional, any global request options declared by the carrier and configued by the merchant to retrieve rates
connection_options.title: Connection Options Instance

schema.title: Check Connection Options Request Payload
schema.description:
The payload sent to a Shipping Provider to check that the store is connected to this provider.
Each Shipping Provider will have different configurations for the payload.

valid.description: Indicates whether or not the connection options are valid

items.title: Message
items.description: A simple string/type response for returning information.

schema.title: Check Connection Options Response Payload
schema.description: The response recieved back from the Shipping Provider connection check this allows the store to understand if the connection was successful.

RateOptionsSchema.description: A set of carrier specific fields that will be displayed to shoppers at checkout

items.description: An individual carrier defined field to display at checkout, along with any defaults and validation

code.description: The internal code that represents this input field

label.description: Display name for this input field

description.description: Longer description text to be displayed as a tooltip at checkout

validation.description: Placeholder for any validation we choose to implement

type.description: How this input will be displayed

default_value.description: A valid default value for this field

value_options.description: For select type fields, the list of available options

date_ranges.description: For date type fields, a set of valid date ranges available to choose from

items.title: Date Range
items.description: Representation of a range of date objects
